titulo: Mujer, crea [Woman, Create]: Despierta tu capacidad creativa [Awaken Your Creative Capacity]
descripcion:
Mujer, crea es el tercer libro de la serie de libros de bolsillo Mujer, de Omayra Font, y lleva el mensaje de la capacidad creadora de la mujer. La mujer es inherentemente creativa porque todas tienen el don para cambiar las cosas, mejorarlas y convertirlas en algo diferente; llevan, inherentemente dentro de sí, el potencial de crear. No obstante, hay dos tipos de mujeres: las que conocen su creatividad y la expresan abierta y exitosamente; y las que están convencidas de que no son creativas en absoluto. El propósito de este libro es enseñarles a buscar y encontrar sus talentos dentro de sí, y llevarlas a potencializarlos al máximo.
Woman, Create is the third book in the series of "Woman" pocket books by Omayra Font and carries the message of the creative capacity of women. All women are inherently creative because they have the gift of changing and improving things, turning them into something new; they carry within themselves the potential to create. However, there are two types of women: those who are aware of their creativity and express it openly and successfully, and those who are convinced that they are not creative at all. The purpose of this book is to teach women to seek and find their inherent talents and to lead them to their highest potential.
